properties.name: ARC Clinics
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali ARC Anti-aging Beauty Clinics have been operating in Indonesia since 2002. Our facilities are located in Jakarta and on Bali, Indonesia. ARC is the uses more Botox and Aquamid than any other medical or cosmetics outlet in Indonesia. A team of qualified nurses supports our Australian-trained staff of specialist dermatologists. ARC Clinics are open 10.00a.m. to 6.00p.m. Monday to Friday, and from 10.00a.m. to 3.00p.m. on Saturday. Closed on Sunday.

properties.name: Bali Adventures
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali Established in Bali in 1989, Sobek Bali Utama was the first Adventure Tour Company of its kind on the island. Taking pride in a proven 100% safety record even to this day, Sobek invests heavily into thorough industry recognized safety training standards. Each and every one of Sobek\'s 265 staff receives on going training and development to ensure they are the very best in their field. Ultimately Sobek works hard to maintain its reputation and market position as No.1.

properties.name: Bali Bakery
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali Bali Bakery offers a distinctive culinary array of local and Western foods to tantalize and tempt the most discerning of taste buds. From our deliciously wholesome a la carte menu to our tantalizing array of breads, pastries and cakes we have something to cater to all tastes in a relaxed and easy atmosphere that is perfect for casual dining or just a relaxing coffee.

properties.name: Bali Best Cycling
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali Bali Best Cycling is one of cycling tour company in Bali managed by Bali Best Ways Tours operator taking the best ways for route to discover the real part of the island’s life and beauty from mountain batur to black sand beaches on the west of Gianyar (Place of Traditional Indonesia lunch local BBQ). Was new established since November 2007 with team consists of young, dynamic and experienced friendly guides. Great cycling tour company in Bali, we are committed to your satisfaction. Bicycle tour is one of the best ways to fulfill your wish. You will discover, not only the “the un-exposed” sites of the island, but also you will get to witness the daily life of our traditional farmers, engaging yourselves in a close conversation with them, and learn how the ancient farming culture has been preserved through generations. Acknowledge by many tourists as one of the best bicycle tour operators in the Western part of Bali, “Bali Best Cycling” offers you our young, experienced, dynamic, and friendly guides who will take you through some beaten tracks to get you experience Bali in different views, something the average tourists may not experience. Not yet to mention our total 4 hours excitement from Batur Volcanic Lake going downhill; watching rural life parade; special temple ceremony; stopping at our traditional village “warung” for some traditional treats where you also be entertained by Balinese children before we arrive at black sand beach on the West of District Gianyar for local barbeque lunch with our traditional fishermen.

properties.name: Bali Cycling Tour
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali Feel the spirit of nature in Bali and the curious of nature touch, with our enjoyable cycling route (for all ages). With our professional cycling guide in charge, we allow you to experience the traditional life style and be a part of the original Balinese farming ritual and daily activity. We will pick you up at your hotel and take you up to Kintamani. Enjoy a Balinese breakfast with the wonderful active volcano of mount Batur and it fantastic lake overlooking the restaurant. The mountain bike ride start after breakfast, and is all downhill with no traffic. Our 45 km routes passes through a traditional village and enjoys the wonderful Balinese country - side life. Our professional cycling guide will escort you through 3 hours, full ride. Along the route we will visit a Balinese rice plantation, traditional village and temple, rice paddies terrace tarring, handcraft workshops and meet the happy and friendly people in their village. At the halfway point of the route we’ll visit a peaceful holy water spring, we call it Pura Tirta Gunung Kawi, in Sebatu, Tegelalang.

properties.name: Bali On Horse
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali Situated near the beach in the lush green rice fields of Kerobokan, The Umalas Equestrian Resort Bali. Umalas Stables is the most comprehensive riding facility on the island, providing boutique hotel-style accommodations in a tropical setting, complete with poolside restaurant and swimming pool. Thirty-two horses are stabled at Umalas: Thoroughbreds, Warm-Bloods, Stock Horses, and Thoroughbred Crosses, as well as ponies of different breeds. Most of the horses are imported from Australia, Europe, and New Zealand, providing for a selection of disciplines and sizes to suit the varied needs of riders. High quality English tack ensures safety and comfort for each ride. Qualified European and local instructors teach beginner through advanced Dressage and Show Jumping in the covered riding hall and outdoor arena. Umalas Equestrian Resort offers riding tuition for children and adults alike. Guests can enjoy rides along Bali\'s wide sandy beaches, and through the lush rice terraces of local villages. Riders of all levels can uniquely experience traditional Balinese life viewed from horseback and will surely take home unforgettable memories of magical rides in the land of smiles. A stay at Umalas Equestrian Resort promises an experience to be remembered, and for many, a dream come true.

properties.name: Bali Shell and Silver
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali  LETUNG was founded by I Wayan Gede Suantara, who has been in the Bali silver jewelry business since 1998. We specializes in the production and exporter of handcrafted Bali silver jewelry including :Silver rings, Silver earrings, Silver pendants, Silver bracelets, Silver necklaces, on a hardline of Bali shell and silver jewelry

properties.name: Bali Silvers
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali  Balisilvers.com is a company of wholesale silver jewelry handcrafted in Bali. Offer Bali ethnic sterling silver jewelry such as bracelets, necklaces, rings, earrings at low wholesale prices. Sterling silver jewelry is a many-facetted art form, not only in the variety of work made, but also in the range of materials used and the different intentions of the artist creating the pieces. Bali Silvers is a portfolio of work of sterling silver jewelry made in Bali. It features traditional items, such as rings, necklaces, bracelets, earrings, pendants, brooches, hoop earrings and toe rings.

properties.name: Bali Sunrise Tours
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali Amazing Adventures into a Unique Culture and Landscape. We offer Bali tours for every traveler! Bali Sunrise was founded in 2001 by I Gede Mangun, who was born and raised in Songan Village, in the Batur Caldera. He has spent his whole life trekking the mountains of Bali. Adventurous in spirit, Gede has traveled extensively in Indonesia, and has recently wandered as far as Europe in order to experience Western culture first hand.

properties.name: Bali Tourism Board
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali Bali Tourism Board (BTB) was established on the 1st of March 2000 formed by nine major Bali tourism associations. With the unstable business climate hamper the island, BTB is hoped to build and develop a better and more sustainable tourism industry in Bali. Considering the importance of the tourism industry and the capability of BTB in associating with government, community, and industry alike, the Governor of Bali officially recognized BTB on 10 May 2000 as the embodiment of a new partnership between the travel industry, the government, and the local community. Since then, BTB has earned the respect and support of all related government agencies, including the Indonesian Ministry of Culture and Tourism. BTB consults with and represents the tourism industry, the public, and the government with a new spirit and under a new paradigm. BTB aims to increase the quality of life of the Balinese people while facilitating and enhancing the travel experiences of both domestic and international tourists through synergy with relevant non-governmental organizations, the mass media, and local authorities. With this new paradigm, BTB is clearly functioning as a tourism board that is responsible for the continued development of the local community.

properties.name: Bali handara kosaido
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali The Absolutely Green in the lush high heartland of Bali at an altitude of 1.142 meters above the sea level which surrounded by rolling mountain, crater lakes and ancient forest, the course design is meant to blend the fairways and create a dramatic backdrop for tea shots and approaches. The deep blue sky, the air fresh, clear and the temperature average between 14 - 20 Celsius degrees. It is rights comfortable golfing destination in Bali. It features tall trees and flowers of riotous colour separating the fairway of this 18 holes championship course. Designed by Peter Thompson, Michael Wolferidge & Associates, Bali Handara Kosaido Country Club will make you feel a part of the rich, sporty, and exotic nature.

properties.name: Balinese Spa
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali After your workout, enjoy Balinese oriental massage treatments and relaxation services in Balinese Spa, utilizing traditional Indonesian spa products. Deep muscle massage,aromatherapy, foot reflexology, Balinese traditional massage, Shiatsu massage, jacuzzi steam and sauna,and spa packages massage. Let Balinese oriental massage, spa & reflexology in Balinese Spa help you start your day by enjoying a relaxing adventure through Balinese spa treatments.The pace of life is full of stress. Alleviate the stress with one of our relaxing spa Balinese oriental massage services.

properties.name: Beji Ayu Spa
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali BEJI is a Balinese word that refers to a place of holy spring water where Balinese people perform a spiritual cleansing and purification ceremony called \'\'Mesucian\'\'. This is where the holy water is also often gathered for many traditional ceremonies. AYU is Balinese word for deep beauty - both inner and outer - that can be perceived by others from one\'s behavior: a relaxed glow, good - will toward others, and a warm - hearted presence.

properties.name: Bela Seafood Cafe
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali We aim is to provide the highest quality seafood at reasonable prices. Live lobster and prawn is kept in seawater aquarium near the entrance. Our chef Made Nanik prepares dishes simply but expertly and our seafood served with Balinese traditional sauce has already become a favorite of seafood lovers.

properties.name: Devira Bali Massage
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali Massage… one of alternative treatment to recover of body tiredness and stress. When the blood press by tension muscles, blood circulated will be blocked. Massage will alleviate the system circulation. Massage will release the muscle and good blood circulation help the body and mind stay in relaxs. The traditional balinesse massage using bali massage techniques with firm finger and thumb pressure to easy away all bodily tension, invigorate the sense, leaving your body invigorated and relaxed mind.

properties.name: Indigo Batik
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali Batik is a resist dyeing process in which patterns are drawn or stamped on a piece of cloth with melted wax. When the wax sets it acts as a dye-resist, so that the waxed parts of the cloth remain unaffected by the dyes. The wax is then removed, usually by boiling the cloth, and the process is repeated over and over again until the desired pattern is achieved.

properties.name: Inna Grand Bali Beach
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali Located on the site of Bali first five-star Hotel Bali Beach, founded in 1966 - is the most complete resort complex in Bali, featuring state-of-the-art visitor facilities, but also numerious artistic amenities that bring to life the cultural excellence of the Balinese people and their many talented neighbors. Jln. Hang Tuah Sanur - Bali 80032 Phone : +62-361-288511 Fax : +62-361-287917

properties.name: Kioski Gallery
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali Kioski Gallery designs, manufactures, and exports handicrafts and furniture out of Bali. We believe that our favored position at the source combined with 14-years of experience makes us a very competitive provider of exotic handicrafts and furnitures. We believe that having high quality furniture with affordable prices is important for you and your customers. Our products, manufactured at our factory in Singaraja, have gone through a thorough quality assurance checking to ensure that you are getting the highest quality from the best selection of furniture.

properties.name: Mama Leon Textile
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali Mama & Leon - the essence of quality textile and garment production, at affordable prices. With more than 25 years’ experience, our company has become a household name in Bali’s highly competitive fashion industry. We not only export to countries across the globe and supply numerous local manufacturers but also have a chain of up-market retail boutiques throughout Indonesia.

properties.name: Nirwana Bali Golf
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali Nirwana Bali Golf Club is a visual masterpiece of dramatic ocean views and lush Balinese landscapes. Designed by Greg Norman, the golf course offers a spectacular challenge and a unique world-class experience for golfers of all skill levels. Lying in the lush landscape of Bali\'s Southwest coast, Nirwana Bali Golf Club ly reflects the natural beauty, spiritllality and rich culture of Bali. A 30 minute scenic drive from Kuta the course is within easy distance of the famous temple ofTanah Lot, Ubud and the capital city of Bali Denpasar. Designed by legendary golfer Greg Norman, Nirwana Bali\'s 18-hole golf course is one of the most photographed and challenging golf courses in the world. With three holes running along the cliffs of the Indian ocean and terraced rice paddies providing unique hazards the course will test the accuracy and consistency of a PGA Professional and still be enjoyable for the average golfer. Set on the southwest coast of Bali 45 minute drive from Ngurah Rai International Airport, Nirwana Bali Golf Club is the centerpiece of the fully integrated Nirwana Bali Resort. Come and experience the ultimate that golf in Bali has to offer!

properties.name: Plaza Bali
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali Opened in 1991, Plaza Bali offers a unique shopping experience. Blending elements of the exuberant Balinese culture with comfortable relaxed surroundings, friendly multi-lingual staff and a world of other services. Plaza Bali offers an exciting holiday attraction that you won\'t soon forget. It\'s more than just shopping, it\'s an experience!

properties.name: Sari Amerta
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali Sari-Amerta is an art shop located in Pujung Kelod-Tegallalang- Gianyar- Ubud- Bali - Indonesia. Produce cute and funny bali wooden animals for gifts, souvenirs, and collection made from wood with artistic design, smooth finishing and good quality.

properties.name: Suarti
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali Suarti Company designs and manufactures sterling silver jewelry on the island of Bali for wholesale purposes. The company employs expertly trained craftsmen where a strict adherence to quality control is always maintained. Suarti’s main focus is the manufacture and production of its own unique designs reflecting the culture and tradition of Bali and other, Indonesia; however, it also has a production facility dedicated to accepting and manufacturing designs from other parties. The company now also manufactures many lines of trendsetting fashion oriented jewelry on a platform where classic becomes contemporary and traditional becomes modern.

properties.name: The Photo Factory
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali Windee Winata is company founder and main photographer of The Photo Factory, a Bali based Photography Company. He has been photographing since 1996 and doing it professionally since 2000. Works almost unnoticed, capturing the emotion and spirit of the day with an extraordinary warmth and candor, his wedding photos are spontaneous, intimate and graceful. He thinks of his picture as window of life that will recall who you are, what you were thinking, what made you laugh, what touched you, and how you felt. He is a master at capturing fleeting expression and gestures. Windee’s background in photojournalism has taught him to find the telling images in a scene without arranging or changing it. His aim is to remind you of the event, the people, the surroundings and the emotions on your special day. He shot weddings for his siblings and friends long before taking it up professionally. His works have been exhibited numerous times in Germany.

properties.name: Pura Beji
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali This most unusual temple lies halfway between Singaarja and Kubutambahan, in the tiny village of Sangsit. Built out of red brick and completely covered in carvings, the subak or rice-irrigation society temple dates back to the 15th century. It is probably the most baroque-looking temple on the island. The shrines seem to burst with carved turrets. Old frangipani trees fill the courtyards inside, giving the entire place a feeling of stillness. At the gate, you will be asked for a small donation fee.

properties.name: Batukaang Village, Bangli Bali
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali Batukaang means that this village is located at the rocky hills. There is an archaeological remains in the form of 188 statues which are still believed as sacred by the local people according to the result of a research carried out by the official of Bali Government of cultural office, in which is stated that this village holds a kind of belief which is the harmonious combination between meghalitical beliefs, the ancestor worship and the worship of Gods as manifestation of Hyang Widhi. After the entrance of Hindu influence, there have recently been built Holy buildings in the form of "Candi" (Shrine), "meru" (storey-roofed shrine), etc. The developing art inherited by the people of Batukaang, still has a close relation with religious activities as a sincere dedication to the God i.e. : Pendet and Rejang dances are the performances accompanying a ritual which are associated with the art as mentioned above. This village is located at the height of 1.150 meters above sea-level. So that the temperature is quite mild the same as that at Batur Resort. Along the road, one can see the wonderful, with its spectacular panorama. Mt. Batur at the distance Coffee plantation stretches like a carpet at the foot of the sky. High mountain with clouds in the sky indicates the fertility of mountainous nature. At the time the coffee plantations are flowering, one can smell a fragrant odor that increase the desire to go to this village. All of these are the attraction for tourists visiting this site.

properties.name: Candi Dasa Beach
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali History "Bhuwana Tatwa Maharesi Markandya" inscription describes that Candi Dasa Temple which is located opposite to the pond is a holy place to worship God Almighty, however the reason why the place and the temple named "Candi Dasa" is not described, so there is an assumption that the name "Candi Dasa" might be derived from the existing of "Lingga" (the divine symbol of Syiwa) located inside the hole on the upper side of the hill. In the inscription described that the temple was built by a group of high priests, Syiwaist and Budhist at the time of King Jayapangus reign in 11121 Caka year or 1190 A.D (or around 1117-1181), therefore it is assumed that Candi Dasa temple was built in 12th century. It is also described in the inscription about "Bhuwana Tatwa Mafia Resi Markandya", in which Candi Dasa temple functions as: - The holy place to worship God Almighty (Ida Sang Hyang Widhi Wasa). - The divine symbol of Syiwa (Lingga) located inside the hole is a means of worshipping Syiwa to humbly request for fertility, prosperity and the sustainability of the Universe. It is also a special means of spiritualists or hermits to achieve "Sunyata" or "optimal emptiness" (God as Syiwa\'s nature) with prime letters "Om Namah Syiwaya". - The place of "Hariti Goddess", statue placed on the lowest part of the hill of Candi Dasa. The statue was sculptured as a mother with 10 children surrounding her, to indicate the figure as the lover and protector of children as well as the Deity who bestows fertility and prosperity. Therefore, the locals of the neighborhood village mainly childless couples of long time marriage come to worship with special offering for Hariti Goddess requesting a child.

properties.name: Pasar Kumbasari (Kumbasari Market)
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali Next to Pasar Badung in Kumbasari market which is dominantly engaged by people selling handicrafts, textile and other things for souvenir, preferred most by visitors. Pasar Kumbasari and Pasar Badung are bordered by Badung River which is also programmed as one of points of interest of the city-tour package of Denpasar Municipality.

properties.name: Pelaga
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali This area located on northern tip of Badung regency, at the border area of Badung, Tabanan, Buleleng and Bangli regency. Its natural beauty and cool weather has been known since long time ago and it has been a favorite place for holiday retreat and refreshing, proved with a resting-house built there by the Dutch Government and now managed by the local government of Badung regency. Range of mountains, valleys, terraces of rice paddy field, waterfall and evergreen coffee-plantation will amuse visitors while visiting this area.

properties.name: Puputan Klungkung Monument
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali  "Great nation are those who show honor to their heroes merit" is the proverb referred by the Government of Klungkung regency in building the monument as to show respect to their heroes who had lost their lives during the struggling time against the Dutch colonialist taking place on 28th April 1908, right on the site where the monument erected, a heroic moment known as "Puputan Klungkung", a war till the last drop of blood of Klungkung people and their King at that time against the Dutch troops. The monument as mentioned above, is in the form of "Lingga¬Yoni" (male and female sex-symbol) erected on an area of 123 square meters in extent, completed with "Bale Bengong" (resting place) on every corner. On the base part of the monument is a wide square hall with four entrances facing four directions. The height from the base up to the top is 28 meters, while between the base hall and the "lingga" (male sex symbol/phallus) is an octogonal space layered by nineteen lotus petals. This is to symbolize and illustrate the date of 28th April 1908 to be commemorated every year.

properties.name: Ujung Recreational Park
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali  Ujung water garden was built by King of Karangasem in 1919 and formally functioned in 1921. This water garden is one of the two the King\'s resting - places instead of Tirtagangga water garden, north of the central town. About 250 m north of Ujung water garden, there is a temple called "Manikan Temple" also built by the King of Karangasem, which temple now has gained back its glory after renovation. Next to the temple is a pond where the King and his people used to carry out a ceremony called "Metirta yatra" as to request blessing and prosperity to Almighty God. This kind of ceremony is still traditionally done by the Local Goverment of Karangasem along with the people, mainly those of "Subak" ( farming organization) members of Karangasem regency

properties.name: Yoga In Bali
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali By controlling the breath and holding the body in steady poses or asanas, yoga creates harmony. Yoga practice consists of live key elements: proper breathing, proper exercise, proper relaxation, proper diet, and positive thinking and meditation. The exercises, or asanas, are designed to ease tense muscles, to tone up the internal organs, and to improve the flexibility of the body’s joints and ligaments.

properties.name: ALAM BALI
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali Alam Bali is one of the famous silver craft in Bali. We provide all kind of Jewelries such as : - Filigree Jewelries : Brooch, Bracelet, Earring, Earring Stud, Clip, Necklace, Pendant, and Ring. - Solid Jewelries : Brooch, Bracelet, Ring And also the combination jewelries, decoration and craft. Please be comfort with our nice services and quality product.

properties.name: AXMI Beauty Salon And Skin Care
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali With time goes by, in November 1999 AXMI opened a branch in Hotel Bali Reef Resort that located in Tanjung Benoa Nusa Dua region and use AXMI Beauty Salon & Spa as a brand name. This branch is segmented to give a maximum services to the guest of the Resort, and also to introduce to foreign tourist about the Indonesian traditional and face treatment that we offer such as Javanese Lulur and Balinese Massage.

properties.name: Agabong
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali We are an Indonesian exporter, Wholesaler, and trading company based in Bali Indonesia providing web-related sales/services for companies who want to being a distributor sell our products. We sell indonesian jewelry, bali beads and jewellery, made from wood beaded, coconut wood beaded, ceramic beaded, glass beaded, glass coral, etc. We open our shop in 1995 on 379 Legian Street Kuta - Bali, which is on the main street between Melasti and Padma streets. Our specialty is necklaces and bracelets, chokers, indian dream catchers and wind chimes, indian bags and other beaded bags.

properties.name: Agung Rai Museum
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali The AGUNG RAI MUSEUM OF ART (ARMA) was officially opened by the Indonesian Minister for Education and Culture, Prof. Dr. Ing. Wardiman Djojonegoro on 9 June 1996. The museum is administered by the ARMA Foundation which was set up on 13 May 1996. ARMA is more than a museum. It is a centre for visual and performing arts, and provides opportunities for the visitor to enjoy the permanent collection of paintings, special temporary exhibitions, theatre performances, dance, music, and painting classes,bookshop, library and reading room, cultural workshops, seminars and training programmes.

properties.name: Air Bali
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali As the only western managed helicopter and light aircraft company in the region, AIR BALI continue to set the standards in executive aircraft charter needs. Our dedication to safety and professionalism goes far beyond the norm, and with clientele that rank under the who\'s who of the corporate, sport and entertainment world, we sure know how to treat our clients like royalty. Our Executive Lounge at the domestic departure terminal provides a comfortable waiting area where clients can check-in with ease. From here our friendly staff will escort you to the exit gates and waiting aircraft. Whether it\'s majestic volcano\'s, scenic beaches, private picnics, helicopter weddings, hotel transfers, getting to the golf course in time, or being flown on a life saving medical air ambulance flight, AIR BALI is your answer.

properties.name: Air Sanih
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali This is a recreational garden with natural pool by the Beach of Bali Sea. The view is marvelous, the clear-watered natural-spring pool with trees surrounding it. This bathing place is located on the beach of Bukti village, district of Tejakula, Buleleng regency. It is about 18 Km in distance from Singaraja, the capital-town with fine asphalted road.

properties.name: Alam Puri Art Museum & Resort
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali It all began from my love of artwork, which eventually led me to being an art collector, of not only paintings and statues but also primitive art. Initially I collected artwork as an investment, but then I fell in love with my collection, and I have never wanted to sell any of it even though I got some very high offers

properties.name: Amed Beach
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali Amed Beach East Bali is everything you dreamed it would be a rare and special paradise of outstanding exotic beauty, vibrant culture and friendly people. Here you can finally find peace and quiet, enjoy great food and take advantage of comfortable and inexpensive accommodation. From the beach, Amed offers an excellent site for training dives. It has a flat bottom lagoon for instruction and a coral reef only 5 minutes swim away. This location is highly recommended for introductory dives. By boat, Amed has a nice wall dive just a few minutes away. It is a fun, easy dive for everyone. Snorkeling and diving off the black-sand beaches here is exceptional, the variety and numbers of fish on display are among the best on Bali and the water temperature is a constant 28 degrees. Schools of cardinal fish, triggerfish, black snappers, pyramid butterflies, banner fish, and damselfish can be seen on the sand slopes, while table corals, big fan gorgonians, and magnificent stag horn Acropora and Dendronephthya trees, dense growths of sponges, crinoids, and sea fans are commonly found within 20 meters of shore.

properties.name: Anantara Seminyak Resort & SPA
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali Situated on 3,500 square metres of prime beachfront, Anantara\'s Bali resort at Seminyak features 59 suites of approximately 80 square metres, furnished in true Anantara style, including plasma screen TVs, contemporary Asian-inspired furniture, broadband internet connection and signature spacious baths. Anantara\'s facilities include a destination restaurant on the ground floor, offering an al-fresco and indoor international dining experience, an onsite Anantara Spa, and two infinity-edge swimming pools overlooking the Indian Ocean.

properties.name: Apache Reggae Bar
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali If you are a Dreadlock or Rastaman, this is your party, your to be, Home and your Community.

properties.name: Asta Bali
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali Asta Bali is offering our customers accommodations at discounted rates on every destination, from first class, International standard hotel chains, villas to budget hotels. Our services are combined with sightseeing tours, marine sport tours, adventure activities, marine diving, cruises, ocean rafting, white water rafting, mountain cycling, rice paddy & village trekking, jungle trekking, team building activities, bird park & animal park visit, elephant safari park visit and ride, golfing vacation, yoga tours, surfing, choices of Spa treatments and any other vacation trips can also be organized.

properties.name: Aston Inn
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali The Aston Inn Tuban is an imaginative new three star concept hotel located in the Tuban area of Kuta, close to the International airport and within easy reach of all of South Bali\'s main attractions including Kuta Beach, Discovery Mall and the main shopping areas and nightlife. Here Aston redefines the minimalist business hotel with an elegant style offering soothing colours, resort ambience and award winning service standards. Aston redefines the minimalist business hotel with an elegant style offering soothing colours, resort ambience and award winning service standards. Each marble floored guest room features 21” flat screen TV’s with cable television channels, individually controlled Air Conditioner, Mini Bars, Coffee/Tea makers, in-room safes, IDD telephones and a choice between delightfully comfortable Queen or Twin beds. Bathrooms offer combined bath tubs and showers as well as our select Aston amenities. Jl. Kediri No 5, Tuban, Kuta 80361, Bali - Indonesia Phoone (62-361) 762 828, Fax (62-361) 762 829 E-mail : reservation@astoninntuban.com

properties.name: Atmosphere
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali Located beside the main building of Discovery Shopping Mall in Kartika Plaza Street, Kuta, Bali — makes Atmosphere Resort Café very easy to be reached, since it is near from Legian Street and only 10 minutes from Ngurah Rai Airport. Taking Place in front of Kuta Beach, give the café excellent tropical views and make it a perfect place to relax while enjoying your lunch or dinner. The menu concentrates on Balinese specialties, Western favourites, and some Asian choices. The food here is not only has a good presentation, but also is reasonably priced to pleasure your dining experience. One of the best seller menu is Balinese Dagang Nasi, a traditional Balinese rice accompanied with lawar, roasted duck, skewered prawn, grilled fish, lalapan, sambal and crackers. From chef’s table, the café provide various kind of starters, soups, sandwiches, pastas, pizzas and grilled menus. And from the bar corner, we offers a wide range of best collection wines and famous blend of cocktails, and also various refreshing juices & mocktails. With seating capacity for about 250 people, Atmosphere Resort Café provides various choices of place to sit. Our breezy and spacious opened-air area, completed with a small square pond in the center, becomes the first choices for the beach lovers to relax while enjoying the exotic views of Kuta Beach. The two-story indoor area, equipped with a lounge in the first floor, and three tatami-like tables in the second floor, sets in an ethnic minimalist design, that brings a casual and sophisticated atmosphere while sitting here Opening Hours : Sunday – Thursday : 10.00 am – 12.00 midnight Friday – Saturday : 10.00 am – 01.00 am Find the extraordinary impression. Feel the atmosphere. Discovery Shopping Mall D#36 Jl. Kartika Plaza, Kuta Bali t. 62-361.769501 - 2 f. 62-361.769503

properties.name: Aura Bali
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali With skilled hands and aromatic oils to soothe the mind and body, one is pampered into such equilibrium that pure radiance gleams. At AURA Bali, your aura really shines and the beauty in you radiates throughout. jl. Bisma No. 9, Ubud, Bali – Indonesia Tel. +62 361 742 4255, 786 7000, Fax. +62 361 970 730 Email: info@aurabali.com | Website: www.aurabali.com

properties.name: Bahiana Bali
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali Bahiana is a French salsa bar located in the Island of the Gods, here to say Bali, in Indonesia. You will discover plenty of coktails and rum based soaked preparations in a festive salsa ambiance! You will wlso participate in a weekly theme parties (Bikini party, 80\'s party, etc.)!

properties.name: Bali Adventure Tours
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali In 1989 the adventure story began with the birth of Bali\'s first true adventure company. A unique world-class water experience, conceptualized by visionary Australian Nigel Mason, was the inspiration behind the first \'5 Star\' White Water Rafting operation in Bali. From its inception, the dynamic \'island first\' operation heralded spectacular success prompting a rapid expansion to include additional adventure tour excursions. See also Company History Now, forging into the new millennium Bali Adventure Tours has set industry benchmarks servicing more than one million visitors with its\' unparalleled tour facilities and services. Its unquestionable status as the Number One choice for tourists worldwide is a testament to the companies \'Still the One!\' slogan.

properties.name: Bali Advisor
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali Trekking and Bird watching! I have mentioned some great walks in my book "Impressions of Paradise". Walking is my favorite way to feel the country, slow down to its pace, and get to those small villages with glimpses of rural Bali. It is usually good to get an early start, as the sun rises fast and it gets hot. I find that when in Bali, I usually wake up at 5:30 a.m. It is possible to take a walking tour of all of Bali, using the back roads and trails that many of the villagers have used for centuries. These by-way passages take you out of modern-day life and into the Balinese culture, which is still very much intact. Whether you intend to walk your way through Bali, or just stroll for an hour, I recommend foot power to truly imbibe the spirit of this island. There are warungs in every village to rest your feet and have a cold drink. There are also springs, rivers, and baths along the way.

properties.name: Bali Bamboo Creations
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali Bali Bamboo Creations is an international joint venture between a Balinese and an American family. The Balinese family has been involved in the bamboo furniture business their whole lives, learning the craft from their father and grandfather. All bamboo furniture is custom-made to order, and handcrafted in our Bali workshop. We use a unique finishing process, with all furniture available in multiple colors. This process highlights the natural beauty of bamboo and can also provide the look of natural hardwoods using bamboo . Bamboo is a sustainable, and an environmentally friendly quick-growing natural resource. We accept Visa, MasterCard, American Express and PayPal for all orders and utilize UPS for shipping direct to your home or business.

properties.name: Bali Bird Park
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali  Find yourself at the Bali Bird Park to witness the largest and finest collection of Indonesian birds in the world plus fantastic birds from Africa & South America. Encompassing two hectares of botanical landscape, the park provides sanctuary to almost 1000 birds of 250 different species. Our innovative approach towards the display of rare and tropical birds has progressed from traditional exhibits to that of showcasing mixed species in their natural habitats & in large walk in Aviaries and free range throughout the park.

properties.name: Bali Botanica Spa
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali Hidden from the main road amidst lush natural gardens, this calming day spa reflects Javanese architecture with a touch of colonial style. The welcoming oasis presents a sense of harmony between the landscape, the surrounding rice fields and the bordering stream, all joining in a concerto of relaxing greens. The tasteful treatment rooms are well-spaced, each with its own bathtub, shower and splendid view of the natural habitat. A team of dedicated people offer superior Spa experiences focusing on balancing the seven main chakras. \'\'To keep the balance is essential\'\' says Mr. Iyan Yaspriyana, yoga teacher, energy therapist and Spa trainer / advisor for Bali Botanica Day Spa in Ubud. Our aim is to deliver a deep sense to the Spa, a contact with the soul and a joyful sense to take home and experience forever.

properties.name: Bali Dance Festival
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali  Kecak dance is very unique, there is no musical instrument used in this dance. The background music is coming from troupe of bare-chested male vocals serve the chorus making the sound of “chak-chak-chak” surrounding the dancers.The dance it self is taken from Ramayana and divided into some episodes. Angklung is a traditional Sundanese bamboo musical instruments, it is made up of several bamboo pipes and can produce various melodic sound. To play, you don’t have to hit it. All you have to is to shake it with your hand to produce the tone.Here you will see the traditional Sundanese bamboo musical concert that is performed by a small group.See their dynamic performance and natural expression.Bharata, the third son of King Dasaratha was Crowned as King of Ayodhia to fulfill his fathers wish. Rama the eldest son and the crown prince, left his father’s palace followed by his wife Shinta and his younger brother Laksamana to the Forest.Rahwana, the King of Alengka intend to kidnap Shinta, he ordered his Prime Minister Maricha to transform himself as a golden deer to allure Shinta.With this trick, Rahwana succeeded to kidnap Shinta and brought her to his Kingdom.

properties.name: Bali Dance Oka Kartini
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali Galanty show that was born in about the 11th century in Java. It developed as public entertainments that told "Ramayana" and "Mahabharata",etc. after it had spread to Bali. Wayan (doll) that makes buffalo\'s skin openwork in detail blows by Darang (narrator) that manipulates it and is crowded. In the excerpt of an Indian epic, there are chiefly a lot of one of the repertoire that the satire etc. were mixed. The shadowgraph is done at midnight, and the oil lamp is a light inside, and it is likely to continue very much for 6 hours or more. As for galanty show Wayang, the ancient epic Mahabharata and Rarmayana of India are presented. The story of Wayang Kulit is "The sacrifice of Bima" from Mahabarata. The puppeteer who is called Darang manipulates 100 dolls or more, and does everything alone as talking and the dialog also throwing one\'s voice out. The shadow that reflects on the screen is fantastic.A reason popular in not only Bali but also the entire Indonesia is understood. It is important public entertainments performed without fail in various ceremonies of ceremonial occasions.

properties.name: Bali Golf And Country Club
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali Bali Golf and Country Club, voted "One of Asia\'s 5 Best Golf Courses" (Fortune Magazine - USA) will offer visitors to Bali a truly unique golfing experience due to the fantastic setting of the course. Golfers will experience three distinct playing environments throughout the 18-hole course.

properties.name: Bali Hai Cruises
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali Indonesia\'s leading Marine Tourism Company, Bali Hai Cruises, operates exciting Day and Evening Cruises from a private reception facility at Benoa Harbour, Bali. Aboard a fleet of the most luxurious, modern vessels in Bali, our experienced, professional and friendly crew ensures the very best blend of Indonesian and Western hospitality. Bali Hai Cruises visits Nusa Lembongan, located 20km off Bali\'s East Coast in what is known as the "Three Island region". The Island is approximately 4kms long and 2kms wide and is home to around 4,000 inhabitants. Nusa Lembongan and its sister islands, Nusa Penida and Ceningan, are surrounded by crystal clear water and spectacular coral reef which makes for fantastic snorkeling and diving. Aside from Tourism, the main industry on the island is seaweed farming. The seaweed is cultivated, harvested and then exported all over the world for use in cosmetics, food stabilizers and medicines. Other sources of income include traditional wooden boat building, farming peanuts, sweet potato crops, and fishing. You can have a sampling of this during our village tour.

properties.name: Bali Museum
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali The Ethnographical Museum is the only museum one can find in Denpasar, located on Mayor Wisnu Street next to Jagatnatha Temple. It was built in December 8th, 1932 in which displayed various old objects in four main buldings called: Gedung Timur, Gedung Buleleng, Gedung Karangasem and Gedung Tabanan. In Gedung Timur is displayed many kinds of pre-historic collections including equipments of Bali\'s traditional technology. In Gedung Buleleng with its typical style of North Bali architecture is displayed a lot of collections of Bali traditional hand-woven materials for ritual purposes while in Gedung Karangasem is displayed various kinds of ritual preparations and equipments and in Gedung Tabanan is displayed abundant of art-products (sculptures, paintings, jewelries, artist outfits, etc). Instead of being a recreational place, Bali Museum is also an object of Scientific Study as well as exhibition venue. Visiting Hour : 08.00 am -15.00 p.m. (except holidays).

properties.name: Bali Ocean Aquarium
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali Bali Ocean Aquarium established since1993, experience in all live tropical fish & invert, distributing and exporting world wide and member of BEFA (Bali Exporter Fish Association). During the time period we have distributing high quality marine fish to many destination around the world. Agus, the owner, have 1 year experience in Los Angeles as wholesaler, importer and trans-shipper until then he decide to establish the business in Bali. With all of the experience and knowledge, Bali Ocean Aquarium know how to cooperate with customers and delivering service to fulfill customer needs.

properties.name: Bali Orchid Garden
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali Bali Orchid Garden is a hectare of landscaped tropical gardens providing a beautiful and relaxing tropical environment with exquisite orchids blooming throughout the year. Located within the green belt amongst rice paddies, it is reached via Jln Bypass Ngurah Rai, Tohpati, approximately 10 minutes north of Sanur, Bali and easily accessed by taxi or en route to other northern and easterly tourist sites. See Map.The Garden is open for individual tourists or tours groups daily between 8am and 6pm. Friendly staff will act as escorts, provide information about the wide variety of tropical plants and help you discover many orchid treasures.It is Bali\'s only Orchid Garden for overseas and local tourists and complements the government botanical gardens. Other tourist services available through the gardens include tours, souvenirs, flower boxes for export, orchid flasks, cut flowers and flower arrangements. Select from the menu to find more information about each of these products. Kopi Bali and Kopi Luwak are available from the on-site cafe along with a variety of other refreshing drinks.

properties.name: Bali Pet Shop
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali Come to the most complete pet shop in Bali ...Please don\'t hesitate to contact us if you can not find any thing you need ...

properties.name: Bali Safari Marine Park
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali  Holiday adventures should be fun, which “Bali Safari and Marine Park” provides in full measure, as well as it’s more profound and enduring mission of conservation. Taman Safari Indonesia is an institution oriented to building tourist attractions that are attractive to visitors, environmentally friendly and that help spread the conservation message. They are the Government appointed Indonesian Centre for the Reproduction of Endangered Wildlife and operate the Sumatran Tiger Rescue Team that relocates them when they come into conflict with humans. By visiting Bali Safari and Marine Park, or their huge complexes near Jakarta and Surabaya, visitors contribute to the conservation work as a percentage of the profit goes to helping Taman Safari Indonesia continue its work in rescuing Indonesia’s endangered wild elephants, orangutans, tigers, and unique birds like the Bali myna.

properties.name: Bali Spirit
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali For an enlightening and balancing Bali experience - health spas, yoga, meditation, resorts, retreats, holistic therapies, eco-tours, and much more. Holistic Bali Online - Your Guide to Indonesia eco-tours, hotels, resorts, villas, accommodation, yoga retreats, Balinese dance and art classes, galleries and museums, healthy restaurants with vegetarian food, holistic health spas that have Balinese raw-foods, fasting, colonics, Balinese meditation and Bali based non-profit organizations and environmental yayasan.

properties.name: Bali Villa Bella
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali Villa Bella is the inspiration of Casa Bella Interiors, a company engaged in luxurious and exclusive interior design since 1997. Because of this inspiration, we diverse into developing 4-5 star villas, as developers and named our new company BALI VILLA BELLA.Our Mission is to give the “investor” peace of mind, security and a Return of investment of 8% per annum. Management & Projection provided by Aston International, Indonesia, who at present time is managing over 2900 suites in Indonesia and 8900 suites world wide.MOU was signed by PT. Bali Villa Bella and Aston International Indonesia in April 18, 2006Our Vision is to develop the first green energy villas development using photovoltaic energy & green energy.The Villas developed by Bali Villa Bella, is for those who value luxury, services and investment. This development is a place where we believe "HEAVEN MEETS EARTH". Rising high above, sits these prestigious community. From the moment you enter the main entrance, you will enjoy an unusual sense of privacy, security and exclusivity. The strict design guidelines set by ASTON HOTEL GROUP will ensure highest quality of elegance with functional space in mind

properties.name: Bali Villa Sungai
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali You can expect 5 star luxury, with the ultimate in full service within your own very private and unique 3 king-bedroom/4 bathroom resort villa, complete with open leisure, dining and bar pavilions perfumed with tuberoses, a private massage area and an exquisite 17m horizon lap pool. Villa Sungai Bali is a haven of tranquillity and refined indulgence, set within the breathtaking beauty of the real Bali, where people live a traditional life, growing rice, observing their gentle religion, celebrating the age-old rhythm of their lives. Villa Sungai Bali, Cepaka, Tabanan, Bali, Indonesia. Tel : +62 8123962478 (Villa Manager). Mobile : +61 410 324535

properties.name: Bali Wood Carvings
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali Wood carving, like stone carving, has traditionally featured largely in temple and palace architecture with little freestanding \'sculpture\' work produced commercially. Immaculately carved demons and mythical beings decorate pillars, door panels, lintels and window shutters with the aim of protecting the buildings from evil intruders. Scenes of legendary figures placed within floral decor set a more pleasant and educational tone. When producing tools and objects for everyday use, sculptors had a much freer hand in choosing subject matter. With the arrival of European influences, wood carving started to develop along more innovative and commercial lines.

properties.name: Bali Yoga Shala
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali BALI YOGA SHALA came into being in 2005 when PATRICIA WIDAYAT returned from 7 years teaching and studying in Australia and joined with WAHYU WIDAYAT (Mas Kelik) in creating this oasis of tranquility in the middle of the frantic beach area. PATRICIA and WAHYU\'s journey with Yoga started many years ago in the 70\'s and Yoga has been a source of joy and support through life\'s journey. They came into contact with the teachings of Yogacharya B.K.S. Iyengar in 1990 and since studying with Mr Iyengar and his family in Pune, India have been his students.

properties.name: Bali Zoo
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali Located on the beautiful island of Bali, our zoo is home to more than 350 creatures. We\'d love for you to come and spend a day with us to experience the beauty of our surroundings, learn about our awesome animals, and hopefully create memories that you will cherish for a long time. african lion As Bali\'s only zoo, we like to call ourselves "Nature\'s Education Centre". Our friendly staff are eager to show you around, talk to you about our animals, what we are doing to make their lives more comfortable, and what YOU can do if you would like to help us out. We have a "hands on" approach to conservation education, and we\'d love to share our ideas with you! Our daily program includes feeding of the lions, crocodiles and tigers, and if it\'s cute and cuddly that you\'re after - why not head down to our petting area and snuggle with a baby monkey? All of our inhabitants are fully cared for by our resident veterinarian, and we are also a bird flu free environment.

properties.name: Bali bombing monument kuta
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali The 2002 Bali bombings occurred on 12 October 2002 in the tourist district of Kuta on the Indonesian island of Bali. The attack was the deadliest act of terrorism in the history of Indonesia, killing 202 people, 164 of whom were foreign nationals, and 38 Indonesian citizens. A further 209 people were injured. The attack involved the detonation of three bombs: a backpack-mounted device carried by a suicide bomber; a large car bomb, both of which were detonated in or near popular nightclubs in Kuta; and a third much smaller device detonated outside the United States consulate in Denpasar, causing only minor damage. Various members of Jemaah Islamiyah, a violent Islamist group, were convicted in relation to the bombings, including three individuals who were sentenced to death. Abu Bakar Bashir, the alleged spiritual leader of Jemaah Islamiyah, was found guilty and sentenced to two and a half years imprisonment. Riduan Isamuddin, generally known as Hambali and the suspected former operational leader of Jemaah Islamiyah, is in U.S. custody in an undisclosed location, and has not been charged in relation to the bombing or any other crime. On 9 November 2008, Imam Samudra, Amrozi Nurhasyim and Mukhlas Ghufron were executed by firing squad on the island prison of Nusakambangan at 00:15 Local time (17:15 GMT).

properties.name: Balicycling
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali Balicycling Operator offers a complete range of cycling services on scenic roads and challenging trails for you to enjoy on your Bali holiday. Balicycling Trails Special Interest (Black Rock Lava Trail, Limestone Trail, Rice Field View Trail, Tropical Forest Park Trail ). Experience Bali on mountain bike. Go cycling and experience the spirit that is Bali. Cycle through the tropical ambiance, ancient rainforests, tranquil Balinese villages, exquisite rice terraces, experience the beauty and culture that is the “Island of the Gods”.

properties.name: Balinese Crafts
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali Balinesecrafts is an exporter all Bali - Indonesia products as Bali furniture, Bali handicraft and gifts, balinese house & interior, The Bali furniture as teak outdoor and indoor, antique, rattan, seagrass, banana leaf, bamboo and more kind made to ordered. We have been exporting around the world since 7 years ago. We export to Balinese House and interior like Gazebo, Bale bengong, Cottages, home office, summer set, swing chair for garden and some products for interior design.

properties.name: Balinese Dance
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali Theater and dance is an integral part of Balinese culture. Balinese dances are famous all over the world and the Balinese themselves take them very seriously. Birthdays, weddings, and temples festivals are all occasions for dramatic performances and dance is inextricably linked with the Balinese religion. The commercial performances for tourists that are today offered on a daily basis in several places of Bali do, of course, not have the same religious significance and atmosphere of a dance that is performed at a real temple festival.

properties.name: Bamboo Bed & Breakfast
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali Legian’s latest budget accommodation, where any fun loving travellers should be bedding down Bamboo Bed & Breakfast is an excellent choice for dynamic travellers wanting low budget accommodation with a great simple taste of cosy styled rooms. The property also owns Tanaya’s Café, which specialises in Japanese Teppanyaki dining and also serve coffee, patisserie and other international cuisines. Legian 131 . Kuta . Bali . Indonesia tel. (+62 361) 756 276 fax. (+62 361) 750 643 reservation@bamboolegian.com

properties.name: Banjar Hot Spring
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali Banjar Hot Spring is known as a natural hot spring have healing power to cure skin disease. The hot spring has been allocated and designed to be a simple pool, surrounded by beautiful countryside while next to it is the biggest Budhist Temple in Bali. Location The hot spring is located at Banjar village, district of Banjar, Buleleng regency. It is about 1,5 Km from the village junction or about 24 Km in distance from Singaraja.

properties.name: Bedugul market
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali Candi kuning traditonal market is located in Tabanan regency and it is about one hour from Denpasar, there will be curvy road stretching from Baturiti until Bedugul, it will be a challenge for you to settle your stomach. Candi kuning traditional market is very popular for foreign travelers and domestic. There are a lot of exotic flowers plants like delicate orchids and roses, vegetables, spices include nutmeg, pepper, paprikan turmeric and so on, fresh local fruits, and art shops in this market. Before candi kuning market there is a big corn statue ahead, and after 50 meters , drive slowly to find parking area You should remember to always bargain in every sellar to find the best price.

properties.name: Belega and Bona Villages
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali At the reign of Ketut Dalem in the 17th, century there were several knights who used to be very famous. One of them was Ki Kebo Iwa who was staying at Blahbatuh village, Gianyar Regency at that time. The well known name of Blahbatuh was due to the invulnerability and magic power of Ki Kebo Iwa. He could not be defeated by his enemies. Blahbatuh derives from two words i.e. "Bala" and "Batu" which means that the people had once been led by an invulnerable and strong man: Ki Kebo Iwa. At that time Belega village was not yet known as it was still under the jurisdiction of Blahbatuh village. Belega was actually derived from two words i.e "Bala" and Aga" which means the origin people. (Bala=people, Aga origin). The people of Belega were originally people from Blahbatuh while Bona is under the jurisdiction of Belega village. The people in this village mostly work in home industry, making table, chairs, dressing table and the like, made of Bamboo. In Bona village the people are engaged in craftsmanship made of palm leaf. They make fan, bags, hats, slippers, baskets, Christmas tree, and the like. Besides, Bona is also well known for its kecak dance performance which is depicted from Ramayana story. After kecak dance performance, it is finally followed by Sanghyang Dedari" dance. This dance is played by two little girls in trance. For the last performance is usually performed "Sang Hyang Jaran dance" in which a man is dancing in trance while kicking bare-footedly a big fire ball made of dried coconut shell.

properties.name: Biasa Art
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali Biasa artspace focuses on the contemporary; we aim to be a nucleus where creative, conceptual and avant-garde can be fostered and promoted, pushing the limits of the generally constrained art market.We aim to develop an inclusive and progressive platform for the recognition of talented, mostly young and previously unexposed artists. Our interaction with the artists is as important to us as their work, as we seek to create a strong networking system which can allow a free channel of communication and expression between art operators and a wider audience.Since our establishment 3 years ago, we have hosted a unique series of solo and group exhibitions, provided a convergence for artistic and intellectual inspiration, and subsequently grown as a recognised name in the Indonesian art circles.

properties.name: Biji Living Arts
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali We are a group of people from all around the world who have launched this website to create a virtuous circle of commerce to support the continued production of traditional Asian textiles, concentrating on those from Bali, Java and Sumatra. The textiles that you find in our catalog were made to be a part of daily life, for both utilitarian and ritual purposes.

properties.name: Bintang Supermarket
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali Bintang Supermarket is one of the largest supermarkets in Bali located in the busy and popular Seminyak area on Jalan Raya Seminyak. Bintang Supermarket is a true landmark building surrounded by small boutique shops selling mobile phones with local simcards and jewelery well-known by both local and expatriate people alike. Across Bintang Supermarket you will also find the legendary Radjas Restaurant. Bintang Supermarket provides you with a wide selection of both local and imported foods and drinks, fulfilling every of your shopping needs. Bintang ever expanding assortment focuses on a variety of diary products, snacks, alcohol and fruits. Next to food and drinks, Bintang has a wide selection of stationary items, household appliances and clothing available on its first floor level. With its ever low-priced articles, cozy setting and centrally-located shop Bintang invites you to come and shop with them everyday from early in the morning till late at night. Jl. Raya Seminyak,Kuta phone +62 361 730552 email info@rasabali.com

properties.name: Body and Soul
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali Body and Soul hit the ground running with the success of its first boutique in 1996. The clothing company, solely fuelled by word of mouth, quickly established a reputation for quality and high end design and began sprouting stores month after month, and has now sky rocketed to over 23 stores, and counting. The ever growing worldwide client base and the abundance of stores, is a testament to the strength of the label. The eye for detail and drive for perfection has driven the success and sustained longevity of the business thus far. Body and Soul is celebrated by many style conscious and trend savvy shoppers, and has quickly become a key source for the most current fashion at a competitive price. Our in house designers and fellow fashion addicts take pride in their brand and keep a daily watch on International trends, to ensure you can have the latest up to the minute looks.

properties.name: Botanic Garden Bali
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali The founder of the BOTANIC GARDEN in Ubud was inspired by the works of Peter Joseph Lenné and Duke Pückler who created the Royal Gardens in Potsdam and Berlin, Stefan’s native town in Germany. Pückler bankrupted himself twice with his passion for creating parks. As a youth Stefan published two novels, some poetry and plays for children’s theatre which are still performed throughout the world, this year in Japan and Brazil. After a career as a journalist with GEO and stern magazine with which he had a stint as Correspondent in Hong Kong for 12 years, he moved to Bali. , Here he ran the little PURI ASRI HOTEL which became a rallying place and famous watering hole for hacks and artists.

properties.name: Bounty Discotheque
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali Located in the heart of night life and entertainment in Kuta. We proudly present Bounty Discotheque to you. Bounty Discotheque is designed as one stop entertainment centre where you can play or hear any kind of entertainment needs. A real discotheque with great atmosphere and unique decoration of old legendary ship of HMS Bounty….. Best described as a unique combination of discotheque, restaurant, fashion show venue, foam party venue, sexy dancer performance, DJ battle merged into one. It’s the only major discotheque in Bali. And the only discotheque committed to featuring integrated entertainment in one place…We present wide variety of entertainment such as Live Percussion. Foam Party, Free Drinking Competition, Pool Table, Fashion Show and Moda, Go Go Dancers, Muscle Show, Drag Queen, Live Music and Karaoke and Live DJ performance spinning Funky Progressive Modern House, Electro House, Hip Hop and R&B.. Bounty Discotheque provides three main bars for you. Tavern Bar, Captain Bar and Harbour Bar. It also presents the Kuta’s largest and loudest sound-system, a huge dance floor and hundreds head shaking guests every night of the week, it’s the most perfect place to party in Bali. Bounty Discotheque is extremely Bali’s most sophisticated discotheque in Kuta. Music is our inspiration. Fuel your adrenaline. DANCE HARD at Bounty Discotheque. Jln. Legian – Kuta – BALI, Phone (0361) 752529

properties.name: Brahma Lelare Statue
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali Gianyar Regency is well-known as an artist area, therefore, the Regent of Gianyar Regency (Mr. Cokorda Raka Dherana, SH. at that time) proposed to place statue at every junction of Gianyar jurisdiction. The statue of Brahma Lelare contains a philosophy of "Pinaka Ratuning Wisesa" which means that the lower level of Government officials be responsible to the upper one, and the upper Government must be responsible to the above level, and so forth.

properties.name: Brahma Vihara Ashrama monastry
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali The Brahma Vihara Ashrama (or Wihara Buddha Banjar) is the only buddhist monastry in Bali and is located near the village of Banjar, about 10 km southwest of Singasari-Kokokan. The monastery is built on a hill and therefore offers a magnificent view over land and sea. It was built in 1970 by Bhikku Giri Rakhita, an important brahman converted to Theravada Buddhism, a form of Buddhism also practised in Thailand. Together with the Indonesian government Thailand has sponsored the construction of the complex, therefore mainly Thai decorations and a golden Buddha statue are presented.

properties.name: Bumbu Bali
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali Discover the spiced flavors of Bali’s virtually unknown cuisine. Classes offer a fascinating introduction to the exotic ingredients and unique culinary heritage of Bali. They provide a valuable insight into the various techniques of food preparation and the cooking style used in our island homes. The FULL DAY PROGRAM starts with an early morning visit to the local vegetable and fish market where many of the ingredients are purchased for the day’s program, including spices, meat, chicken, cakes and the freshest seafood.

properties.name: Buyan and Tamblingan Lakes
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali Viewed from the location, lake Buyan and Lake Tamblingan are strategically located in the middle of three main tourist resorts, i.e.: Bedugul with its Ulun Danu Temple, Gitgit Waterfall and Lovina Beach. With Mount Lesong as the back-ground (1860 m), walling the Lakes and makes its water crystal-like clear which at once creates a very natural quietness.

properties.name: Candi Kuning Market
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali A visit to a local market always provides a fascinating insight into the culture of the "real Bali." Located about 29 kilometers north of Denpasar in the cool hills of Bedugul, Pasar Candi Kuning is such a market. It sells fruit, vegetables and spices plus exotic flowering plants like delicate orchids and roses, thus creating a kaleidoscope of wonderful colors. Spices include nutmeg, pepper, paprika and turmeric. One can purchase inexpensive fresh fruit and vegetables of many varieties as well here. Try a Bali jeruk or pomelo, yellow passion fruit or for the very brave and adventurous, a durian.

properties.name: CasCades Restaurant
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali The setting is luxurious Balinese Style of open pavilions with high alang alang (thatched) roofs, surrounded by lush tropical valley views, water features and beautiful timber finishes. It has been said that CasCades is one of the world\'s most beautiful romantic restaurants combining an atmosphere unparallel to most fine dinning restaurants in the world.CasCades Restaurant\'s vision is to bring it to the next level of a perfect dining experience, developing the uniqueness of the food, service and ambience. The menu has a French base but with a small Asian twist involving influences from Japanese, Thai, Balinese cooking. Also CasCades guests can feel comfortable with the knowledge that a very high standard of hygiene is adhered to at all times. To add some more excitement to the experience of CasCades several adventurous guests have flown in by helicopter, (helipad on site) for that special occasion lunch or dinner.

properties.name: Catur Muka Statue
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali Catur Muka (four faced) Statue symbolizes the manifestation of Almighty God as Brahma, the Creator of the Universe as to control and monitor the global directions. The Statue is made of sandstone depicting a Deity with four faces, each facing the four directions, about 5 meters in height being the municipality of Denpasar\'s mascot. It stands on o km at the crossroad, heart of Denpasar, with fountain surrounding it. Some places of interest are close by Catur Muka Statue like Bali Museum, Jaya Sabha Hall, Puputan Badung Square and the Bird Market it.is about 4 km from Ubung Bus Terminal or about 15 km from Ngurah Rai International Airport.

properties.name: Chill Reflexology
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali When it comes to reflexology and acupressure, Chill surely takes a new approach on these arts. Located on Jl. Kunti Seminyak, near Periplus and Bali Deli, Chill is easily mistaken for the latest lounge bar in that area, but the very moment you enter the Chill Zone, tranquility and soothing smell of peppermint and orange are surely in the air. Unlike ordinary spas which require you to shower and changing cloth in their treatment Chill omit all these requirements, instead Chill gives a refreshing foot washing before the treatment. The treatment area of Chill give a futuristic touch to the row of reflexology chairs, each chair is separated is from another by filmy white curtain. Don’t be mistaken with the word reflexology, With their highly trained reflexology artists Chill not just work solely on foot but also in other parts of the body.

properties.name: Dalem Jagaraga Temple
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali  Dalem Jagaraga Temple belongs to "Pura Kahyangan Tiga" (Three main village Temples) of the traditional village of Jagaraga. Like the other "Pura Dalem" in Bali in general, according to its function as the temple of the dead, Dalem Jagaraga Temple is also located close to the village-cemetery, full with ornaments and statues depicting scaring and horrifying figures with the main statue of the Goddess of Durga. One of the interesting points about this temple is a unique relief carved on the outer wall of the temple illustrating an air battle between old designed-aircrafts (dog fight), armed robbery, rowing-boat, people drinking beer and old designed car! The carver\'s humorous character and the atmosphere had influenced the trends of temple building in Buleleng at that time. The other specific thing about the temple is the existence of "Men Brayut\' statue, a leading figure in a very popular folk stale, illustrating a family with too many Children to be brought up, the happiness and sorrow of the parent, all is illustrated with great humor. All the uniqueness has made the temple known with special interest and has been promoted widely through guide books and other brochures.

properties.name: Discovery Shopping Mall
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali Bali is a cosmopolitan city where the modern and traditional meet head on, You can find a lot of marketplaces like art shop, shoping malls,shoping center, local and foreign restaurants, fine dining establishment and nightlife. People who life in Bali can enjoy the exellent shopping other options available are the shop, stores, boutique and cafe in the nearby tourism areas. Bali especially Kuta has built an exclusive place for various shops. The local and foreigners do not need to go to several shop everywhere as in the others place or spend time caught in traffic jams and public transportation problems. Some of the best place in Kuta area an exclusive place for various shopping and hang-out is to visit is Discovery Shopping Mall, the only mall have a beach front with Luxurious, classy and vibrant with total Net Leaseble Area 40000 Sqm. Located in Kuta Prime area, Discovery Shopping Mall beside its strategic location in between five hotels DSM also presents exclusive facilities such as banks, restaurants, cafes. Kartika Plaza Street , Kuta - Bali 80361 Phone : +62 361 755522 Fax : +62 361 767300 support@discovryshoppingmall.com

properties.name: Doggies Paradise
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali Doggies Paradise helps you to treat scabies, demodectic mange, and other immune system related dog skin disorders. We provide Neem shampoo and Neem oil, an herbal remedy for scabies. Neem oil is an excellent herbal remedy with a long history to treat scabies and skin rashes.

properties.name: Double Six Club
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali DOUBLE SIX CLUB is the hippest and the best dance venue on the island. Being one of the most established night life venues, we know exactly what it takes to get a party started. Located on the beach side of the popular Blue Ocean Beach Seminyak, Double Six is known as the best club in Bali. With international standard of 15,000 watt sounds systems, many international top DJs from all over the world like Tiesto, Pete Tong, Steve Gerrard, Mike Hiratzka and many more has rock the deck at Double Six Club . . . pumping around 1500 people every weekend from 11 pm up until the sunrise, and then go home crossing the beautiful morning beach. The Club is also home to the world’s only Bungy Jump into a nightclub. Fuel your adrenaline. DANCE - JUMP - and PARTY hard at the world renowned DOUBLE SIX NIGHT CLUB. Shortly . . . Double Six Club is not only the most perfect place, it also the most perfect way to party in Bali.

properties.name: Eka Karya Botanical Garden
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali Bedugul Botanical Garden or Kebun Raya Eka Karya is the huge tropical garden located in Bedugul, plateau area in Bali. It is situated in the cool atmosphere with rain forest and hill surrounds it. This botanical garden is opened on 1959 and owns 154,5 ha land located Tabanan regency, northwest part of Bali. It is close to the beautiful lake which is called Beratan Lake and Ulun Danu Temple. It is completed by more than 1187 plant types and multifarious of floras. In this area, there is orchid garden with the collection of 320 orchid types from Bali, Java, Nusa Tenggara Timur, Sulawesi and also Irian Jaya. We can slo meet the rose garden with the collection of various rose from rust colored until green chromatic.

properties.name: Elite Events Bali
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali Elite Events has a reputation for delivering the finest and most unique celebrations in Bali. We specialize in producing tailored, cost effective, creative and spectacular events. The team is headed by Libby Doherty whose experience in delivering large scale public and corporate events is second to none in the region. Prior to moving to Bali, Libby managed major events for the government of Melbourne, with audiences of up to one million patrons. The team of western and local event producers now benefits from her knowledge through ongoing training and development. The Elite Events team is trained in all aspects of event delivery and we pay full attention to all details, procedural accuracy and accountability. We have high expectations and provide a level of service and commitment that you will soon come to appreciate. Elite Events is a member of the Elite Havens Group of companies. Elite Havens, established in 1998, is one of Bali’s leading hospitality providers and the pioneer of the island’s luxury villa rental and management industry. Its products and services are routinely mentioned in international press. Their team of 40 people includes resident foreigners and Indonesians from across the archipelago who possess a wealth of knowledge and hospitality training.

properties.name: Gedong Kirtya
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali Gedong Kirtiya library was founded in 1928 by the Dutch in what was then their colonial capital of the Lesser Sunda Islands, Singaraja, and named for the Sanskrit word \'to try\'. It is in the complex of Sasana Budaya, the old palace of the Buleleng Kingdom. In its collection are lontar manuscripts (written on dried leaves of the rontal palm), prasasti (inscribed on copper plates) and manuscripts on paper in Balinese and Roman characters including documents from the colonial period (1901-1953). Ex Bupati of Buleleng Dr Ketut Wirata Sindhu is upgrading the library into a full museum. When completed, the museum will cover the entire Sasana Budaya complex.

properties.name: Gedung Arca Museum Arkeologi
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali This Museum of Statue is a field archeological museum. It has been built since 1960 under the supervision of Bali\'s Archeological Regional Office and was opened for public in 1974. In this building there is a collection of archeological remains dated back at pre-History of Bali. Among the collection of pre-Historical remains, there are also some stuff made of stones, bones and so forth, the most attractive sight is some sarcophaguses originating from several places in Bali. In general the sarcophagus as are in the form of turtle, having bulges at its sides and decorated with a mask showing a big overlooking eyes, open mouth or joking with its tongue coming out. Other collection, among other things is some bronze statues, etc.

properties.name: Gitgit Waterfall
properties.description: Posted by Isinbali Gitgit Waterfall is a beautiful tourist destination in north part of Bali. Gitgit waterfall is located in the plateau area with the height about 35 meters and it is surrounded by tropical tree and emits the constantly natural water debit during the year. Waterfall voice around the charming nature was amazing and it was the separate attraction which can be enjoyed by each visitor who comes to visit. There are some plantations protecting the rain forest around the waterfall and in this place we often met the wild monkey to get the water from this waterfall. Gitgit Waterfall is one of the famous tourist destinations in Bali which is located in Gitgit countryside, Sukasada sub district and about 10 Km from Singaraja Town or about 70 Km from Denpasar. It is set at height land about 300 meters above sea level. Beside of Gitgit, there is another important spot point like the monument for hero struggle of Singaraja resident who dead on the battle against the Dutch colonialist. This monument is called Bhuwana Pangkung Bangka. This Monument is extant monument and idol of people struggle action against the Dutch colonization. This monument is located in Gitgit countryside and Sukasada sub district and about 17 Km from Singaraja Town . It is situated on the hill bank. The facilities are available at Gitgit Waterfall is consisted of the parking area, restaurant and art shop. It is not far from the waterfall place, there is a place for taking a rest while enjoy the beauty panorama of rice terrace and Buleleng Beach. In order to visit the Gitgit waterfall, all visitors will follow the walkway down until the spot point. This road is one of the omissions in Dutch era where the local resident uses it to access other regions. On 1975, this waterfall is opened as tourist destinations in north part of Bali .

properties.name: Githa
